Imports

componentDef, ../util/bits

Types

DirectiveArg = ref object
  component*: ComponentDef
  isPointer*: bool
  kind*: DirectiveArgKind
Represents a single argument within a directive. For example, in: Query[(Foo, Bar, Baz)] This would just represent Foo or Bar or Baz 
DirectiveArgKind = enum
  Include, Exclude, Optional
Indicates the behavior of a directive 
TupleDirective = ref object
  args*: seq[DirectiveArg]
  name*: string
  filter: BitsFilter
Parent type for all tuple based directives
